hero.title: Zeile Notebook
hero.subtitle: Your ultimate collaborative workspace. Write in Markdown, organize teams, manage permissions, and share knowledge with the world.

features.title: Everything you need to document
features.subtitle: Built for developers, teams, and creative minds.
features.md_desc: Write blazingly fast with full Markdown support, code blocks, and real-time rendering.
features.team_desc: Create teams, invite members, and work together on shared notebooks seamlessly.
features.privacy_desc: From private to public. Set roles and granular permissions for reading, writing, and administration.
features.public_desc: Publish your best notebooks to the public feed and discover what others are building.
